title: Trophy & Achievement Guide
content: f-all-Trades Multiclass into every class in one playthrough without asking Withers to change your character. Leave No One Behind Save every Tiefling refugee you can throughout the game in a single playthrough. Missable Act I Save Nadira from the bugbear. Save Mirkon from the harpies. Save Arabella from Kagha. Convince Rolan to stay and help the tieflings. Complete Save the refugees. Act II Talk to Rolan at Last Light Inn, and Find Rolan in the Shadows. Find Arabella and agree to find her parents
